DOC.brief_summary: At site ( OHSU & UM ) , 180 socially isolated adult 80+ year old recruit Meals Wheels People . Participants randomize either Video Chat Group Control Group . Those Video Chat Group receive computer duration study , use video chat study staff 30 minutes/day 4x/week 6 month , video chat 2x/week another 6 month . Those assigned Control Group brief telephone check-in study staff per week . In-home test occur Baseline , 6 month 12 month . All participant OHSU medication compliance track use electronic medication monitoring device ( MedTracker ) 50 % participant OHSU UM MRIs Baseline 6 month , able safely receive MRIs . All participant sit contribute saliva genetic testing , video chat session record speech language analysis .
